creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: large oval bowl with 31 organic shaped objects within, all with encrusted rough texture as if they have been underwater; bowl (a) has mottled white rough textured exterior with large round nodules and orange interior with many round cavities; parts (b, c) look like large white knots of clay strands; remaining objects are various shapes: doughnut, balls, tubes, hoop, square, rod with nodules
medium: Earthenware with colored glazes and bibelot
title: Radiance and Abundance Vessel
